### ↓↓↓ WELCOME TO MY WEBSITE ^^ ↓↓↓

```{css, echo=FALSE}
body {
  background-image: url('images/rilakkuma1.jpg');
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-attachment: fixed;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  min-height: 100vh;
  position: relative; 
}

body::before {
  content: '';
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, .55); 
  z-index: 0; 
}

.content {
  position: relative; 
  z-index: 1;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); 
  padding: 3rem;
  margin: 10vh 10%;
  border-radius: 15px;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.2);
}
```
